positive.review: Artwork is nice game play is simple, it's OK has the usual free 2 play pay 2 win, again you don't need to purchase content, it's optional but they make out like it's compulsory.Needs more content, not many girls to use.

5/5 for the jiggle physics alone.  Jokes aside, the cel-shaded models and vibrant skill eﬀects are top-notch. Music? Eh, it loops endlessly, but I mute it and blast my own
playlist anyway. Needs more story, but for an idle game, its eye candy with actual
gameplay depth. The 'Nudity' tag is a joke—unless you count armored bikinis as risqué . If you like tinkering with gear sets and passive gains, this beats most mobile-style idle RPGs on Steam.

I have played this game for half month, it's really interesting. There I meet my love characters and go on an expeditions with them in Aklans, and there I play the part of commander that I can get along well with my students which have the identities of black guards! And I have created a guild named "Magic黑V" there in Asia_37 server, if you go in for it, I would be very glad that you can visit it even join it!
Even though the game has a major amount of pay to win, the art is SO good so it gets a pass.

Игра радует приятной пиксельной графикой и глубокой системой прокачки. Затягивающий геймплей с автоатакой позволяет расслабиться, а сбор уникальных реликвий и развитие персонажа дают чувство прогресса. Идеальный выбор для любителей idle-игр, ищущих нечто большее, чем просто кликер.

It's a very good game and requires strategy. It has a good art style and its own  characters. It has a lot of content for its small size. I liked the story of game but I wish the more scenes had more gameplay
Fun free game.  But like most free to play, you do hit a wall.
I started for something bad, ended up enjoying the game instead
I love the complexity
it is fun to play
cool game
Noice
Absolute peak
Pretty decent ngl
ok

Great art works. Alot of price tags and upsell constantly ﬂashing in your face but this game is very f2p friendly regardless. I'was able to colllect almost every character in this game without spending a dime. they have "reruns" all the time so you can just select the one you missed out on. Love this game especially since h gacha's are known to be greedy af.

Artwork is nice game play is simple, it's OK has the usual free 2 play pay 2 win, again you don't need to purchase content, it's optional but they make out like it's compulsory.Needs more content, not many girls to use.

5/5 for the jiggle physics alone.  Jokes aside, the cel-shaded models and vibrant skill eﬀects are top-notch. Music? Eh, it loops endlessly, but I mute it and blast my own
playlist anyway. Needs more story, but for an idle game, its eye candy with actual
gameplay depth. The 'Nudity' tag is a joke—unless you count armored bikinis as risqué . If you like tinkering with gear sets and passive gains, this beats most mobile-style idle RPGs on Steam.

This game obviously isn't for everyone, it's definitely not a "main" game that you should spend all your time into, but it's definitely dopamine inducing fun if you have time to waste and just want to see numbers go up. It's a special kind of cookie clicker but this time with anime girls and booba

Getting things out of the way, yes the game is a gacha, is riddled with predatory micro-transactions, pop-ups here and there. This is a valid criticism of the game, however, the game is very F2P friendly

Now hearing that term doesn't immediately discredit the claims going around, but YOU can definitely play this game without spending a dime. The only question is how fast you want to do it

The devs themselves give out events granting you 3000x Diamonds every single week in their Discord in a form of claimable public code not including in-game events, (for context one 10 pull is equivalent to 1000 Diamonds) there's also events that give you Sanguine Stones which is their second form of currency in your mail very frequently and in-game events spanning for weeks, months or just playable stuff. There's also the gold auction where you can barter for gold with in-game trading with other players where you can use it to buy Sanguine Stones

In-short what I'm trying to say is that the devs are VERY, very generous and that's underestimating how generous they are. If you also want to spend there's great value too

The game offers permanent bonuses for a one-time purchase. You know those other gacha games like Genshin/WuWa/HSR where they offer a monthly pass and you get their currency for pulling every day? This game offers it at a very cheap price and you have it permanently, and you get 300 Diamonds everyday and 30 Sanguine Stones

For context:
10x Diamond Pull is equal to 1000 Diamonds
10x Sanguine Stone Pull is equal to 300 Sanguine stones

It's not a bad deal including multiple permanent bonuses too many to count

AND BY THE WAY, DIAMONDS ARE FARMABLE IN-GAME. IT'S RIDICULOUSLY EASY TOO

The reason why I'm telling all the value of this is because, the game is way too f2p friendly, devs are too generous and this game is made by a small indie team and they know what makes a gacha horrible and they do everything they can to ease up the burden on players

These devs are gacha players themselves and they made a game where gacha isn't a horrible predatory hole where you have to focus on it to have a chance of competing against bigger whales. Every single pull has a way to matter and every single character has a use whether it be for processing front levels, awakening, material etc.

You can enjoy this game without paying, and if you want to support the devs one-time at least, purchase the lifetime pass, they deserve it. The game is incredibly fun, dopamine inducing, numbers increasing type game. It's a bunch of fun, and I hope that they get the recognition this game deserves

Character customization is chef's kiss. Start with a pious paladin, add removable gauntlets, swap her skirt for thigh-high armor boots, and boom — instant fallen  angel'vibes. The sheer variety of clothing styles (from regal to risqué) means everyone can live their aesthetic fantasy.
The stretch/sheer mechanics for hosiery deserve a science award. Pro tip: Pause during dash skills for research opportunities.

I have played this game for half month, it's really interesting. There I meet my love characters and go on an expeditions with them in Aklans, and there I play the part of commander that I can get along well with my students which have the identities of black guards! And I have created a guild named "Magic黑V" there in Asia_37 server, if you go in for it, I would be very glad that you can visit it even join it!
Even though the game has a major amount of pay to win, the art is SO good so it gets a pass.

Игра радует приятной пиксельной графикой и глубокой системой прокачки. Затягивающий геймплей с автоатакой позволяет расслабиться, а сбор уникальных реликвий и развитие персонажа дают чувство прогресса. Идеальный выбор для любителей idle-игр, ищущих нечто большее, чем просто кликер.

This is a free to play game so of course I received it for free. That being said
there are plenty of micro-transactions in the game as in other Gacha games.    
The player vs. player combat is very pay to win heavy but if you don't have a lot to spend and still want to be competitive then it's better to prchase a permanent monthly card for basic coverage

It's decent, the art of the characters is real nice, and has plenty of content to get  through without hitting some kind of progression wall too early. The gacha aspect seems reasonable, Just don't expect to be able to save up much free currency with how many things it's used on and how many characters/events are being run at
once(assuming you want as much of it as you can get).

Lets be real: This game's stocking deformation tech deserves its own Steam tag.
The way diamond-pattern tights warp around the thighs? Obsessed. Swapping between sheer/opaque textures mid-battle? Art. Forget meta builds—my guild now competes for'Best Dressed (or Undressed)screenshots

The QoL features are next-level: oﬄine rewards, one-click daily tasks, and best of all - no forced ads! The 'Claim All' button for achievements alone deserves 5 stars. Devs clearly respect players' time.

It's a very good game and requires strategy. It has a good art style and its own  characters. It has a lot of content for its small size. I liked the story of game but I wish the more scenes had more gameplay

The game has flaws but I still think it's still worth playing:

Superior art/character design
Gear crafting is fun. I find I enjoy this over PoE's crafting

also, the devs recent changes to make the game more fun (faster lvl'ing and more gacha currency mainly) worked on me. I noticed I'd started playing more and felt I owed them a positive review.

The character models in this game are simply breathtaking! Every movement feels ﬂuid, and the outﬁts have intricate details that make them look like high-fashion designs. And yes, some outﬁts are... adjustable. For research purposes, of course

As a gacha veteran, I expected worse...
but the rates are actually decent!  Snagged a rare SP in under 30 pulls, and the pity  system exists (thank god).   Late-game grind is real though—those '1B power' whales make me cry.
Still, its fun optimizing team comps while barely touching the keyboard. Its a solo idle RPG with waifus/husbandos in tame outﬁts.  The gacha's fair, but late-game is a snail race unless you whale.
Still, for zero dollars, its a polished time-killer. Devs, add harder co-op raids and I'll bump this to 9/10.
Fun free game.  But like most free to play, you do hit a wall.
good game to play if your fake busy but still want to game
I started for something bad, ended up enjoying the game instead

some hours played without spending a dime! The gift codes (In discord) give crazy   amounts of diamonds. Devs listen to feedback - they added triple speed after player requests. My go-to second screen game
I love the complexity
it is fun to play
cool game
Noice
Absolute peak
Pretty decent ngl
ok

As a gacha veteran, I expected worse...
but the rates are actually decent!  Snagged a rare SP in under 30 pulls, and the pity  system exists (thank god).   Late-game grind is real though—those '1B power' whales make me cry.

Still, for zero dollars, its a polished time-killer. Devs, add harder co-op raids and I'll bump this to 9/10.
